scripts.install: npm run install-redshift && npm run install-generate && npm run install-viz && npm run install-mq && npm run install-mq-worker && npm run get-fixture
scripts.scale:down: heroku ps:scale mq_worker=0:standard-1x && heroku ps:scale mq_broker=0:standard-1x && heroku ps:scale dataworker=0:standard-1x
scripts.scale:up: heroku ps:scale mq_worker=1:standard-1x && heroku ps:scale mq_broker=1:standard-1x && heroku ps:scale dataworker=1:standard-1x
